name: Xylem and Phloem
description:
As Xylem try to outgrow your enemy tree, Phloem. Grow your roots deeper and deeper, grow your leaves higher and higher.

Instructions:
Use the scroll wheel (or arrow keys) to move the map up and down. 
Click to select and purchase tiles.

Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 by SmaugOfErebor and CodeNMore.
